messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 5/5/01
messages.msgSnippet: May 4 Indianapolis Star : Home Schooling Sweeps Across Indiana http://dailynews.yahoo.com/h/wrtv/20010504/lo/392124_1.html Indiana has seen more than a 550
messages.messageBody:
May 4
Indianapolis Star : Home Schooling Sweeps Across Indiana
http://dailynews.yahoo.com/h/wrtv/20010504/lo/392124_1.html
Indiana has seen more than a 550 percent increase in homeschooling over the
last decade. Profile of a large homeschooling family.

St. Joseph News-Press : Home School chess team scores high
http://www.stjoenews-press.com/Main.asp?UID=201419&SectionID=81&SubSectionID=2

72&ArticleID=15698
The St. Joseph Home School junior high chess team placed fifth out of 72
teams in the Blitz division for those in the ninth- grade and younger at the
recent "Supernational 2: Battle of the Minds" chess tournament in Kansas
City.

Minor mentions:

Laura Derrick
